title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
When performing the following steps:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify it (e.g., move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
4) A dialog will appear
5) Browse for a valid container location
6) Type the filename but ignore the extension, as it is not requested
7) Click Ok

The observed behavior is that the Navigator adds the file in the specified location, but without displaying the file extension.
EB: The expected behavior is that when using SaveAs, the file type should not be forgotten, and the file should be displayed with the correct extension in the Navigator.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify it (e.g., move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
4) A dialog will appear
5) Browse for a valid container location
6) Type the filename but ignore the extension, as it is not requested
7) Click Ok

Observe that the Navigator adds the file in the specified location, but without displaying the file extension.
